CVS Been watching this for months Currently raising cash for a large position Rarely take major positions in individual stocks but when this comes back its going to be a monster Hope the judge strings out his decision over the summer would prefer Jan 2022 LEAPs for the added 12 mths of time for Aetna merger to digest An 8 PE when UNH is at 19 when theyre essentially the same business and roughly the same size is begging for a rip up just requires patience At SP lows not seen since 2013 A large enough sized position and this is a retirement makerbreaker Apologies for the length of the post wanted to capture a summary of all my thoughts in a single post
